name: Bonk'em Good
description:
Bonk'em Good was created for Brain Station 23 presents Hack-A-Jam 2021.

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Hold release - Smash Bonk
  • Right Mouse Hold release - Swing
  • Hit the enemies and time it right to turn them good and swing to send them home
  • Hit the negative pickups with proper timing to turn them good

Author: FireBlaze236

Art Assets: All within Unity and a little use of Krita!

Music: Created by me in LMMS

SFX: freesound.org 

Font: Action Comics font from dafonts

Code: FireBlaze236/bonk-em-good: A game made for Brain Station 23 presents Hack-A-Jam 2021 (github.com)
